column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We kind of hung around the bar until 2 booths opened up and we squeezed our groups into them. We ordered some French press coffee
column2: a raspberry cheesecake and chocolate pie
column3: also a couple others I don't remember at the other table. Everything was just so succulently delicious. The coffee was probably some of the best I've ever had
column4: cream and sugar would have polluted this nectar of the gods.
